subject: Re: [junit] HTML Testrunner
msgSnippet: ... I think it s great. Contact the folks at junit.org and let them know about it once you find a home for the code. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar
messageBody:
Andrew Wilson wrote:

> Has anyone else done one of these? Is anyone else interested? Should
> I publish the code?

I think it's great. Contact the folks at junit.org and let them know
about it once you find a home for the code.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
